H0.text: What is the name of the group of 1,196 islands in the North Indian Ocean, none bigger than five square miles. Lakshadweep

H1.text: What is the name of the group of 1,196 islands in the North Indian Ocean, none bigger than five square miles. Andaman Islands

H2.text: What is the name of the group of 1,196 islands in the North Indian Ocean, none bigger than five square miles. Chagos Archipelago

H3.text: What is the name of the group of 1,196 islands in the North Indian Ocean, none bigger than five square miles. Maldive

A4.text: Lakshadweep is an archipelago of 36 islands.
